```{r setup, include=FALSE}
opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE,
               message = FALSE,
               warning = FALSE
               )
```

# General
```{r, results='asis'}
render_child("_general.Rmd")
```

# Columns
```{r, results='asis'}
for(col.name in names(df)) {
  col <- unlist(df[,col.name])
  
  if (is.numeric(col)) {
    render_child("_numeric.Rmd")
  }
}
```
